snippet.textDisplay:
Me: Im so hyped for this campaign like literally 13 years later we were finally getting a proper sequel to Black Ops 2 campaign with David Mason and maybe have some flashback missions with Woods and Alex again...

Treyarch: Nah bro here have this lazy ass Warzone/zombies acid trip mixed in with co op so you can have no squadmates if you play solo, only pop up speech bubbles because that'll 100% help integrate/immerse you into our new dogshit. 

(What in the actual f*ck we're they thinking when making this game)
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay:
My God...after such atrocities like Price surviving Sarin gas, "I wasn't in that tank", "Are you a terrorist? You look like one" or Soap getting capped like a Monty Python sketch, i never thought i would i see another dumpster fire this huge coming from Call Of Duty.

Well... *I WAS WRONG.*
